website_summaries.verdict: Designed for on-the-go glute and hamstring workouts that get results.
pros: We love the weight belt that aids in creating stabilized tension
Designed to target abs, quads, hamstrings, calves, and glutes
Adjustable, fitting  waist sizes from 23 to 46 inches
cons: Resistance not good enough for some

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with "no-a**-at-all" syndrome and was trying to find other exercises besides squats and lunges. I ordered the Booty Band Set and found the exercises helpful and enjoyable albeit sometimes a little awkward. Not only does it come with the device but also resistance bands for other workouts. The box also includes suggested workouts which I really enjoy. I would happily suggest this to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mingram

customer_reviews.title: Good things to come
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using the The Booty Band but I'm excited for what's to come. I work from home, raise two kids, and use my Peloton days a week but need to up my lean muscle mass game. The included workouts made it easy to jump right in. There's a bit of a learning curve to refine your form so give it time when you first start. My only recommendation for improvement would be a more comfortable, ergonomic waist belt. But I definitely still recommend as is.
customer_reviews.author: Story Collector

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that I am disappointed with is that when I received the package
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the Booty Belt and returned it because the lightest band was way too hard to use. I can't imagine how the other two were. So I looked and looked until I found the Booty Band. The only thing that I am disappointed with is that when I received the package, the box that the bands came in was already opened (seals/tape was broken). Otherwise, it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: The Booty Band was easy to get together and easy to strap on. It came with a ton of exercise moves that are simple to follow I love the quality. The band itself is adjustable, so when you tone up and lose weight/inches, the Booty Belt will adjust with you!! I wish it came with, or I could purchase, other resistance bands to clip on. It did come with LoopBand’s in three different resistance levels which is great. I’d just like the clip on bands as well. The bands are covered, which is much appreciated so I don’t get “band burns.” This totally makes for a great booty and leg workout. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Feel it right away
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Exercises are easy to understand and you feel it right away! I saw a slight lift after 4 days using the belt and bands. I do workout at the gym everyday and eat healthy but need something extra to work the muscles I wasn’t feeling and the booty band does it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good deal for the price! After the first time using it my hips were on fire and that was just from testing a few of the exercises. This eliminates all of the machines you would need at the gym. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Love the product & this seller
customer_reviews.text: This seller responded to my feedback on my order wuickly and with integrity. My order arrived without the carrying case or the nutritional guide nor the printed exercise guide and I gave feedback saying so. I’d already begin using the bands, which do have a slight learning curve for fit and mechanics but I really like what they add to my workout repertoire. I’d found some exercises online and am pleased with everting about them. Sturdy and well made. Anyway, they saw my message and sent me a whole new boxed set with all the pieces included. The illustrated exercise guide gives me way more to work with ina. Comprehensive space. A true value and good company. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Freenyx

customer_reviews.title: Body shape may dictate comfort and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my booty band. I fit it to my waist and started the exercises and the belt just wasn’t comfortable on my body. I really don’t have a booty (which is why I wanted it). So I either had to tie the band too tight so it wouldn’t slip below my waist or i made it comfortable and it slipped off. I am thinking g maybe I am too tall for it ?? 5’7”” I will keep trying. Maybe the yellow coils will stretch a little so it won’t be so tight from waist to ankle that it slides off my hips. I like the individual yellow bands and the exercise booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The resistance was not good enough and the belt cut in to my abdomen
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. The resistance was not good enough and the belt cut in to my abdomen. The design is just impractical and you're better off using weights and machines at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I just received my bootyband
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I just received my bootyband! The package is cute and the three bands seem have a good resistance! I like the whole package, Its great for the price.Also the litte booklet is cute and the 12 month warranty is also very nice. You just have to register and you will have the warranty. The instagram account of corefitnessusa is a must have to keep on the motivation for having the best booty ever ;) So far: everything is nice and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun workout!
customer_reviews.text: Great ab ans thigh workout! I'm 5'4 120lbs, 26in waist, and my brother is 5'6 190 lbs 40in waist, the belt fits both of us no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my booth and set! It has certainly exceeded my expectations. I have had leg pain since i was young but began using this kit and it has helped so much! My leg pain has completely diminished and my legs and butt are so much stronger and more muscular! I love the resistance bands too- I can do them anywhere and there are so many different exercises I can do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E.

customer_reviews.title: Felt the burn
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good at home exercise product, provided with easy to follow work out instructions, and a nice product bag to keep all the bands and belt together in one place. I felt the burn and am looking forward to seeing the results! If you wear long workout pants, I don't think you will feel any discomfort that I have read from other reviewers. I have been wearing long yoga pants and have not felt any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Tried it and returned it
customer_reviews.text: When used this for kickbacks, the waistband was uncomfortable, the legbands were difficult to push with my legs & the funky ruching cover on the bands would get caught in the carabiners that attached to the waistbands. When I tried to extend my legs forward with them (per the exercises in the book), it felt like I was going to blow out my knees. Returned and will look for a different/better way to tone my tush.
customer_reviews.author: These Seattle Girls

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fine for tall folks!
customer_reviews.text: Got mine this morning and I’ve already tried out all the exercises! I was worried because some of the reviews mentioned not being suitable for tall people but it works just fine. The scrunchy material does need to be adjusted through the loop to make sure you can stretch the full length but otherwise I had no issues at all and I’m 5’10. I was worried it would be flimsy or that I’d have fear of it breaking when I stretched it out, but this thing is solidly made. The company made it easy by emailing me a PDF of the exercises prior to receiving so I could get familiar with the exercises. Really exciting to keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharksgirl858

customer_reviews.title: So far I think it’s great and can’t wait to see the results
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and have only used it once. So far I think it’s great and can’t wait to see the results. My only complaint is the belt digs into my hips and today they’re really tender. I’m sure I’ll get used to it and it won’t hurt the more I use it. I do have the same question as another reviewer about ordering more bands when I’m ready to move up from this one, but I’ll look into that more when I’m ready. So far I’m really pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like that this kit includes both the belt and 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this kit includes both the belt and 3 resistance bands. However, I've already been working on my seat for a bit so I didn't find the exercises as challenging as I'd hoped. I also felt some of the exercises included in the guide more in my thighs or abs. With enough reps I did get sore the next day, but ultimately I'm looking for greater resistance over high repetition. I'd also appreciate a breakdown of which movements target which part of the glutes.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. It does exactly what it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. I love it. I was a little apprehensive about the belt digging into my waist but it does not dig at all. The resistance is very good and you can feel it in your muscles for sure. The bands are very good also, they' are not to thin or to thick. I keep one at work to use for quick five-minute squat breaks. I work at a desk so I tend to be immobile for long periods of time and I need to move from time to time. I am very happy with this product and the price was good also. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ScrollerJCT

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to anyone who wants to workout and work on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just came in the mail and I am obsessed! Definite 10/10, I recommend to anyone who wants to workout and work on their body shape! I'm already starting to see a difference! I am so excited, thank you so much Booty Band for creating my dream excersize gear!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Walter

customer_reviews.title: Excited to see what it can do
customer_reviews.text: I've used it one day and the burn was definitely there. I mainly got this for glute exercises but it comes with other ones. I don't know how I'd ever be able to do the leg extensions it calls for because I feel like I'm going to break them when I try to extend my legs. I'll just stick to the exercises geared towards the glute. Hopefully in a few weeks I'll have a nice one :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: NO BUTTS ABOUT IT....THIS IS THE BEST BUTT WORKOUT ON THE MARKET!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW....this is no joke!!! I have been working out for years and this has got to be by far, the most intense muscle building & resistance training I have ever done! I have been using this for 2 weeks now and I could not only feel...BUTT see immediate results, which is very satisfying...as long as you can deal with being sore afterwards, this is definitely the product to buy if you need help getting your butt, stomach and legs back into shape and looking sexy!
customer_reviews.author: JackOfAllTrades

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a good deal. Obvious it only works if you use ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good deal. Obvious it only works if you use it. I wish the rough side of the velcro was on the opposite side, where it doesn't rub on my yoga pants. I surprised that I actually use and like the plain bands more. I use to be able to go to the gym every day and as long as the goal is toning and not building bulk this will work for hamstrings, abductors, adductors and glutes in an at home setting or for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Chicky

customer_reviews.title: Great at home workout tool
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and my height is mostly in my long legs, I was worried I was too tall to effectively use this product. I will say this is a great purchase and way to strength gluts but there are some exercises I truly can't do flutter kicks and "in and outs", I find it really difficult to have both legs extended, maybe this will get better as I continue using it but any solo leg kicks, lifts, etc works well. The belt was uncomfortable at first but as I continued I got use to it and don't feel such a significant pull while trying to workout. Overall I enjoy this product, get at home workout tool.
customer_reviews.author: BeaP

customer_reviews.title: Frustration rather than workout
customer_reviews.text: This must be for women that are on the shorter side. I am 5’8 and can barely extend my legs with my feet in the straps. If you loosen the waistband to have a little give, the tension makes it slide right off your waist, leaving you open for a potential injury with the entire thing slinging across the room like a rubber band. More of a frustration than an actual workout. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: april l. alauf

customer_reviews.title: This was the best thing I could have done for myself
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I could have done for myself. Starting 2018 with a healthy mind, body and soul. Thanks to the booty band set I am able to target not just my booty but legs and abs as well. If your thinking about buying this set, think no more just push that button and do something good for yourself. It was easy to put on and use. I'm also using the yellow bands for upper body as well. Just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I thought that I was in decent shape but these things showed me that I can get in even better shape.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t just going to work your booty. Your abs and quads are engaging too! I thought that I was in decent shape but these things showed me that I can get in even better shape.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gunia

customer_reviews.title: Sweating in no time
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was sweating in less than 5 minutes and yes my booty is sore. Good sore though. I also love the exercise booklet and nutrition plan because it's versatile in all your exercise needs. Shipping is fast and it's now my favorite thing in the world. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Marie Clark

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome! I am excited to see the progress and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the booty band and I tried it out...my buns were on fire! It is awesome! I am excited to see the progress and how it helps shape my booty. I really like the workout guide! Great product :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hits all the right muscles!!! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, I wasn't sure about this product at the start and even struggled with it a bit because I am a tall girl. But once I got the hang of it and once I noticed I was strapping it on my feet incorrectly (lol) it totally worked great!! Such a good burn!!! I really love it and my butt is sore as hell! Can't wait to see where this will take my booty! Such a great new piece of equipment in my workout room!
customer_reviews.author: brianna jones-mattes

customer_reviews.title: Muscles are already toning up after just a couple uses!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Booty Band set. I can feel my muscles working as I’m using them and the next day I’m pretty sore. So I know they are working. My muscles hurt in places that I didn’t know possible and it feels great! After just a couple of uses my legs are feeling stronger. I highly recommend trying this set. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6 foot and it doesn't exactly feel like it's made for taller people
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, overall. However, the bands do feel a little flimsy. I'm 6 foot and it doesn't exactly feel like it's made for taller people. It works, but the belt just doesn't hit in the right position. The visual exercise guide is nice, but don't tell you how long to do each exercise for. I did feel it work after 15 minutes of exercise, but that's after day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty terrible result
customer_reviews.text: Pretty terrible result. The bands are hooked on by clips which tend to pinch and get in the way when you have to lean on backside to do the exercises. I had it worked out in weeks when I tried it. I was sweating and getting tired, but was never ever sore. My core definitely got a workout but that was about it. The extra bands you get are not varied in strength so you can't switch it out as you get stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Bootybands!! It’s simple to use, afterwards or later you can feel that you got a good workout with them, and overall I’ve been using them for about three weeks and already notice a difference not only in my butt, but also my thighs, abs, and legs. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: fawn n. pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As an ex figure competitor and personal trainer I have purchased countless products, this booty band set is the highest quality I have ever seen for this type of equipment. Really awesome!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie martini

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous being 5'2" that it would not work but let me tell you I felt the burn from the very first workout...been using it about a week and everyday I get stronger and stronger...love it so far...
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The booty band is perfect for me and my schedule
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really into working out. The gym makes me uncomfortable and I really don't have to exercise being a busy working mom. The booty band is perfect for me and my schedule. Mine just arrived today and already had my first workout. I could get used to this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Girard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable and an awesome workout! Highly recommend. I have short strong legs and it still works
customer_reviews.author: Sam-i-am

customer_reviews.title: great idea, small problem
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Booty Band particularly to improve the muscle tone of my butt and legs. Perhaps it is only an issue with my set: I am just under 5'9"and the right leg is perfect, but the left leg is not quite long enough so I cannot properly do the exercises. That and it hurts my knee, catching when the band does not stretch that final fraction. Is there a solution, as I believe it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Lynde Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Burns!
customer_reviews.text: Really feel it in the booty and the Abs!!!!! I feel like it may rip when I fully extend my legs though. It sort of pulls down on the belt part and pinches me with the buckles in the back. I guess I just expected more for the price. It literally feels like it'll break and the band across my waist hurts! Not sure if it's supposed to, but I've watched the video and seems as though I'm doing it right.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Some training tips would be good especially since I’m a novice
customer_reviews.text: I can certainly feel the burn and am positive I’ll see results. It was a bit confusing on how to strap in and a little awkward getting use to the desired motions. Some training tips would be good especially since I’m a novice. Like how often, how many reps, and should you use both types of bands or alternate or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that the kit came with a list of exercises with clear pictures to understand and when necessary clear directions. I was also happy to find 3 additional bands with varying levels of resistance. I'm nearly 6' and I wish the bands would extend longer, but they seem to be slightly too short for a couple of the exercises although there is more resistance seeing that the bands are slightly on the shorter side.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came in a nice box with everything inside. Packaged well. Appreciate that they have one year warranty included. The three loop bands are very useful in working out different muscles. The only thing I wish to make this bootyband better is the option to choose the level of the attached yellow bands. I'm 5'2 and would prefer a heavier resistant on those bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POWER BOOTY WORKOUT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BOOTY BAND I HAVE FOUND THAT IT WORKS REALLY WELL AND IT IS EASY TO USE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE WHO IS SERIOUS ABOUT GETTING THEIR BOOTY AND LEGS IN SHAPE.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bisnar

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good customer service. - It works!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great. Responded quickly to my concern and sent out a new band right away. The band works great. My booty was sore after the first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: LolaW

customer_reviews.title: Best Piece of Workout Equipment I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO impressed! I did my first workout with the booty band a couple days ago and I’m on fire in all the right places! It’s well made, and high quality, and I am so excited to see what it can do for me! The booklet with exercises is so easy to follow, too! All around an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for every female who wants a sexy booty
customer_reviews.text: So far very good love it very much, easy to understand also has warranty on the items. You’ll break a sweat fun and challenging yourself to burn and buil the summer booty. I recommend it very much just on time for summer, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product so far!! It seems super strong and there is a full one year warranty in case any tubes or bands snap. They show you where to register and they are even offering $10 Amazon gift cards for registering for the warranty at the moment! Great value!! Excited to test out all the moves in the exercise guide I downloaded from their site.
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received my booty band a couple weeks ago and I'm obsessed with it! I don't go a day without using it honestly. Super convenient and easy to use. The only thing is I find myself pulling the band up as it tends to move down during exercises and I have to tighten it from time to time. I can already see results and that's why I purchased it! I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fabric! Best Booty Bands
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other types of booty bands but this one is by far superior. I appreciate the little exercise book that also comes with this and there is an app to assist with different workouts. It also comes with a bag so you can put everything into it for on-the-go! GREAT! This set is definitely well made and I love how they use the fabric/nylon to cover the resistance bands. Overall, great product! I will definitely buy it again, and be sure to sign up for their warranty
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back!
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing but is terrible. The velcro was too short to securely fit around my sneaker and the band must have been the highest tension because I could barely move it without feeling like I was damaging my knees. I was so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Davidson

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly like the expensive pink one that’s out there. Don’t waist your money on the other. Promise your gonna love it :)
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most is it’s exactly like the more $$ expensive one I almost got. Exactly the same except the colors. I just had a full knee replacement and it’s perfect for building my muscle back. It’s small enough to take anywhere. In fact it’s going to Mexico next month. I love it!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: I love the booty band set except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: I love the booty band set except for one thing, and that is the belt really hurts the hip bones, the material is not forgiving and I have to cinch it to the smallest waist size in order to fit me and it pulls down and irratates them. I have needed to put a towel around the belt to make it comfortable, otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now I am pretty flexible and am only trying to tone up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Is extremely difficult to get on feet with belt on.. Now I am pretty flexible and am only trying to tone up and I had to put the straps on my feet then kneel down and put the belt on. The metal carabiners and metal clips dig in to you butt and they suggest wearing a towel. What!!!! Not a easy comfortable piece of home equipment.I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: so much better then going to the gym I can do this ...
customer_reviews.text: So excited been using for a couple of days and i can really feel the burn, so much better then going to the gym I can do this in the comfort of my own home and anytime, can't wait to start seeing results... Great Product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chashawna

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you adjust the straps before you put it on.
customer_reviews.text: Love my booty belt. The workout guide is great!!! It’s fits into my other workout routine perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Hoping this will help build my booty! Would love an online video demo of someone doing a routine with this product. Need some inspo! But it’s a solid product and look forward to using it. Build that booty!
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Quick and easy way to feel like i did something productive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because a friend of mine raves about them. She built an @$$, Im trying to lose one, so far i love this, we'll see how it goes. Seems durable, has a great warranty(1 year) just in case it isn't so we should be good.
customer_reviews.author: A consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Booty Band. My wife and I both tried it out. It was a little difficult for me to get my feet in the straps, but that’s probably because my ankles aren’t that limber. Once I had it on, it was incredible butt workout. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barry I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is an excellent tool, very easy to use and the belt is very comfortable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how hard it was at first! Once I got it going, I could feel the burn in my booty immediately! I broke a sweat after the first set of 10 kick backs! I can't wait to use it everyday and get that shapely booty in no time!!
customer_reviews.author: Weldon and Carissa H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! my ABS are killing me, not just my booty haha
customer_reviews.author: kitten_pop_

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I only used this for a few minutes because I am really out of shape and my muscles are tight, but I can tell this is going to be an amazing workout for me. I felt my abs, my quads, my gluteus maximus, and muscles I haven’t felt in a long time being worked. I am going to start using this every day. I know I will see the results that I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mom29

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy and strong and I will Only be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: If your 5 feet tall this isn’t gonna work for you. You don’t get the tention of the bands because this is meant for a tall person. Also, the belt around your waist doesn’t get tight enough and medal clasps are very uncomfortable. It’s sturdy and strong and I will Only be able to use the resistant bands So if uour under 5’5” don’t bother
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great for fast effective workouts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to bring on work trips. It is great for getting a workout in a tight space in a short amount of time. I recommend it to everyone. Try it and you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: AMarie Berrena

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" and it works well for me - it is challenging, though, in a good way. I have been doing some of the exercises everyday for a couple weeks and I can feel some difference already. The first package I got didn't come with the loop bands and they were quick to send me another full package! The service is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Feel it working.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. You can work out for just a few minutes anywhere and feel that it's working.
customer_reviews.author: shelley crane

customer_reviews.title: My booty is on fire!! This really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my booty band quickly and I could wait to try it. The resistance bands are awesome. My butt was burning after only 1 rotation. I do all the exercises in the guide twice. This is a great addition to my home gym. I have only used it for 1 workout so I am not sure about results but if this is any indication, I can expect to have a fab booty very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i hate working out so i want something effective that can ...
customer_reviews.text: as a lifelong cheerleader i was excited to try this. i put on the bands and did the first set of exercises and the sweat just poured out of me. i hate working out so i want something effective that can get the job done quickly. this is definitely that product. if you order it, GOOD LUCK! this is NOT EASY
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Oppenheim

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This was so uncomfortable. The bands hook to the belt with a metal clip. If you are doing any exercise on your back, the metal clips dig into you.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great workout product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! my boyfriend and I use it for at home work outs. I love that its so versatile! ( I am 5'2, he is 5'11). Good quality and comfortable while using. Would Purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittan carver

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of it. The actual bands came frayed and it was over all awkward movements. I'm used to regular bands from PT but this was weird and it dug into my skin even thru my yoga pants. I'll update as to the effectiveness in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product because I consistently see the same ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I consistently see the same workouts that are supposed to give you that “Brazilian buttlift”...I’ve been working out for quite sometime and knew that these moves needed some sort of resistance to them, bootyband is just that!!! It’s really delivered a tough workout, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice add to my pilates workout at home
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with these resistance bands. They fit right in with my workout plan at home. The additional resistance is welcome on days when I want a more robust workout.
customer_reviews.author: Great Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, resistance is good strength.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it for the first time, love the exercises that come with it, easy to understand. I have to wear the belt pretty tight since I don’t have hips or a butt (yet😉), so when I do the exercises that engage my abs and core it kinda digs in to it and not the most comfortable. I’ll try to adjust it next time to make it easier. Also a huge fan of the 3 resistance bands that come with it. Can’t wait to see some results in a couple weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the booty band about a week ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the booty band about a week ago and have tried it out a few times. I am really excited about the way my body feels during and after the workout. I can feel that I am working my glutes more than I ever have and I'm targeting them appropriately now. I am excited to visibly see results!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnandbuddy

customer_reviews.title: So far my experience has been super positive with the Booty Band Set
customer_reviews.text: So far my experience has been super positive with the Booty Band Set. I like the medium amount of resistance that the bands are and the only thing is getting adapted to the positioning of the belt when first putting it on; once I had that down, I was comfortable performing the exercises. I also like the three other resistance bands that came with it; I use them going up and down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M Marandola

customer_reviews.title: They give you a exercise guide with it with is great. I didn't think it was going to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it but boy is it rough lol I'm sore for sure. They give you a exercise guide with it with is great. I didn't think it was going to be hard at all with having exercised previously but it works you. Can't wait to continue my workouts with it to see if I get results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the resistance bands but......
customer_reviews.text: I really like the resistance band but the booty band was really hard to work with, it was so tight that I couldn't extend my legs all the way out.
customer_reviews.author: HairMama6

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great for the price. As someone who goes to the gym 6 days a week, I was impressed by how much it engages the glute muscles. My only complaint is that I wish the resistance was adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really does work. Workouts are not very long either!
customer_reviews.author: Michala

customer_reviews.title: The ordering process all the way through shipment was easy peasy. Everything was packaged securely with detailed instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Bootyband just arrived today. Not used it yet but I am looking forward to beginning. The ordering process all the way through shipment was easy peasy. Everything was packaged securely with detailed instructions for setup, use, exercise samples, etc. I am pleased so far and looking forward to seeing results soon. Will check back in with update.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McGinness

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! My only complaint is the bands don’t even themselves out very well so the band stretches unevenly on each side of the band.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the product and I am excited to see the results in the next few months. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lidija Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this workout tool, I am a busy mom and can’t always spend time at a gym but this gives me a workout that shows results almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great core workout!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the booty band for Christmas! I am an avid weight lifter and am in the gym everyday but this gives me an added edge at home. I love the unexpected core workout that I get from this product! Can’t wait to use it again today.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E Scotilla

customer_reviews.title: The system is very durable and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: The system is very durable and comfortable to use. Nice booklet of exercises and loopbands as an extra. It would be nice if it came with the light and heavy belt system as well. Maybe a workout plan too. Overall it I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It's a must!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday and it does it's job. It's easy to use at the same time it's hard because you will feel the burn on the intended part. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: C_Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: Love the Booty Band Set. I find it comfortable and it provides me with a good amount of resistance. Gives a good amount of burn as well! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as an alternative to something similar that costs over twice as much as the booty band. I’ve always found targeting certain areas to be a challenge, but I can already tell I’m going to be sore in all the right places tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I like this booty band set because I’m exercising at home ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this booty band set because I’m exercising at home and it’s really working. When I first start use it it was kinda hard for me my legs was weak but after couple weeks I saw a progress. And I also like a package everything is in a bag very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: GALIYA

customer_reviews.title: Quality is important to me!
customer_reviews.text: The Booty band is quality made. It’s easy to use, and I don’t have to go to the gym to work my glutes! I’ll be using these often! It came with 3 extra booty bands and a nice carry bag to store them in!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to had some weight to my booty and leg work outs. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: K****L

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable material, and well worth the price. Some moves are slightly more difficult for those of us with longer legs (I have a 34" inseam) but still a great workout. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN SHEW

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Thought it didn't fit me at first, but after playing around with it I figured it out. The only thing I would recommend is having better instructions (possibly a video) on how to put it on and use it! So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Clements

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! After my first time using it for 15 minutes my butt and thighs were burning!! I go to the gym and never burn like this, so I’m hoping it’s working muscles the gym does not touch
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love the band itself
customer_reviews.text: Love the band itself, but seems to be very tight, can’t get a full extension. It also has a heavy fabric over the bands which are hard on your legs when on your back. Wish there were interchangeable bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mom of an almost year-old little girl and finding time to workout can be a challenge. Within minutes of using the Booty Band, I could feel a difference in my butt! Muscles I had forgotten existed were screaming at me to stop. I can’t wait to see how this product transforms my body and all it’ll take are minutes in my day!!!
customer_reviews.author: KimTheRunningMom

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable at first, but push through it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the booty band exercises that come with the kit. The band feels weird and uncomfortable the first time you use it, but once you start strengthening your muscles, it feels a lot more natural. I like the resistance bands too.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Harper

customer_reviews.title: Not for bad knees
customer_reviews.text: Not good for bad knees. Makes my knee hurt but seems to work. I just have to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Check Waste Size of Booty Band Before Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the Booty Band set, but the actual booty band that straps on the waist is too big. Make sure you order the correct size. I'll make it work, but wish it fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Core Fitness USA Booty Band Set for Glute Workout. Advanced Butt Lift Tool Includes Adjustable Waist Belt, 2 Tube Bands, 3 Mini Resistance Bands, Carry Bag and a Full Exercise Guide
product_meta.description:
GET THAT BIKINI BOOTY - Get ripped abs and a bikini booty and be the envy of your friends at your next pool party!

RAPID RESULTS - Get stunning booty in 10 days with just 15 minutes per day. Remarkable results in 30 DAYS!

ALL SIZE - Our waist belts are adjustable and will fit waist sizes from 23 inches to 46 inches. Easily adjustable and padded waist bands adds extra comfort to your waist and legs.

ALL IN ONE KIT - Every set comes with 1 x BootyBand, 3 x Mini loop bands with 3 levels, 1 x "Work It" black dustbag, and a Complete Exercise Guide in PDF emailed to you immediately after purchase.

OUR GUARANTEE - Buy it, try it out at home and if for any reason you are not happy with your purchase, return it to us within 30 days for a full refund.

IMPORTANT: About Exercise Guide
Exercise guides are emailed to you automatically right after your purchase. In the unlikely event that you did not receive one, please click on [Contact Seller] and we will send you a copy immediately
